title: Republicans MUST STOP Funding the Border Crisis | Guests: Rep. Chip Roy & Ryan Walters | 9/21/22
description:
Glenn exposes the worsening political division in America and paints a terrifying future if America doesn't change its course. Rep. Chip Roy joins to discuss the crisis at the southern border and blasts Republicans for helping President Biden fund the problem. Glenn and Stu review and critique the statements made at Clinton Global Initiative. Glenn plays a "doomsday" situation, predicting what might happen if nuclear weapons are launched. Senate candidate J.D. Vance joins to discuss the extremist rhetoric the Left has adopted. Ryan Walters, Oklahoma's secretary of education, joins to discuss the perversion of America's education system.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
